privacy_policy.title: *Introduction*
privacy_policy.content: Thank you for using *AgriHouse*! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our app. By using *AgriHouse*, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

privacy_policy.title: *Information We Collect*
content: *Personal Information:* When you sign up or log in, we collect personal information such as your email address and username through Firebase Authentication to manage your account.
*Post Content:* Any content posted on the app may be accessible to other users or public depending on the app’s settings. Please be mindful when sharing sensitive information.

*Usage Data:* We may collect data on how you use the app, including browsing history, features accessed (e.g., BMI Calculator, Zakat Calculator, News WebView, and Branch Information), and interaction details to improve app functionality.
*Device Information:* We collect information about the device you use to access *AgriHouse*, such as device type, operating system, and IP address, to optimize performance and security.

privacy_policy.title: *How We Use Your Information*
privacy_policy.content: We use the collected information to: enable core functionalities like sign-up, login, and post-sharing; provide personalized recommendations and user experiences; improve app performance, monitor usage, and troubleshoot technical issues; update you with app changes, news, or promotional offers if you opt-in.

privacy_policy.title: *Sharing of Information*
privacy_policy.content: We do not sell or trade your personal information. However, we may share anonymized or aggregated usage data with third-party providers to help improve the app's performance or for analytics purposes. These third-party providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and are committed to protecting your data.

privacy_policy.title: *Security*
privacy_policy.content: We take data security seriously and implement standard practices to protect your information. However, please understand that no method of electronic storage or transmission is 100% secure.

privacy_policy.title: *Third-Party Services*
privacy_policy.content: Your use of *AgriHouse* may involve third-party services: Firebase Authentication for sign-up and login, Weather API to provide weather information, and News WebView to display external news sources. These services have their own privacy policies, which we recommend reviewing.

privacy_policy.title: *Children’s Privacy*
privacy_policy.content: *AgriHouse* is not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect data from users under this age. If we learn of any personal data collected from children, we will take steps to delete it.

privacy_policy.title: *Changes to this Privacy Policy*
privacy_policy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the app following these changes signifies your acceptance of the updates.

privacy_policy.title: *Contact Us*
privacy_policy.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [Your Contact Email].
